name: LittleBigSoko
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Little Big Soko - This is a puzzle game on the tank. Your task is that you must move the boxes to certain points on the tank to move to a new level. At higher levels, you will face really complex puzzles, which will take really time to complete.
The game has Full Screen and windowed mode. You can turn off the animation in the game menu. The game is designed for even the smallest players.

★ Exciting, fun and useful gameplay with excellent repeatability.
★ Brainwave puzzles - for those who know how to work head, not the spinal cord.
★ Hundreds of possible solutions for each puzzle
★ Many unique and beautiful levels
